mapper.select: select ec.id as id, ec.title as title, ec.price as price, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, cover, et.`name` as teachName, es1.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course ec left join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_id = es1.id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_parent_id = es2.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id where ec.id = #{id}
